To install DMControl, run `pip install dm-control==1.0.4`

```
python profile_dmcontrol.py

Num steps: 10000
Simulation time: 1.160520315170288 FPS: 8616.82459951824
Render time: 19.261722803115845 FPS: 519.1643604372899
```
